H0.text: The adjective leporine relates to which animal. Rabbit

H1.text: The adjective leporine relates to which animal. Squirrel

H2.text: The adjective leporine relates to which animal. Guinea Pig

H3.text: The adjective leporine relates to which animal. Hare

A4.text: Leporidae () is the family of rabbits and hares (Lepus), containing over 70 species of extant mammals in all.
